page.title: 20SUTTON VILLAGE: THE TEAM
page.content:
{***** { * { * { * hese pupils of}Woodbridge School, Woodbridge{were volunteers from my {fourth year mathematics class.
{ Malcolm Bruce Mark Page-Turner Ivan Carroll Alastair Penny { Vicki Davenport Joanna Pratley James Griffiths Jonathan Simpson { Rupert Hallam Geoffrey Underwood
We cycled to the Sutton area on Sunday the 2nd June 1985 from Woodbridge on a hot, cloudless summer's day. We split into groups to cover the whole area and met in the late afternoon at Methersgate Quay.{ { { Andrew Garfath-Cox { }their Mathematics Master.
